name: Sarah Chen
bio: Former VP at Google Ventures with 15+ years in startup acceleration. Led investments in 50+ companies with combined valuation of $2B+. Passionate about empowering diverse entrepreneurs and building sustainable innovation ecosystems.

name: Marcus Rodriguez
bio: Serial entrepreneur and tech architect. Previously founded two successful SaaS companies (acquired by Salesforce and Adobe). Expert in scalable infrastructure and AI/ML applications for early-stage startups.

name: Dr. Amira Hassan
bio: PhD in Innovation Management from MIT. Former program director at Techstars and Y Combinator. Designed curriculum for 200+ startups with 85% graduation rate. Specializes in product-market fit acceleration.

name: James Park
bio: 20+ years in venture capital and private equity. Previously Managing Director at Sequoia Capital. Led Series A-C rounds totaling $500M+. Expert in fintech, healthtech, and deep tech verticals.

name: Lisa Wang
bio: Founder & former CEO of TechFlow (acquired by Microsoft for $1.2B). Angel investor in 30+ startups. Board member at Women in Tech Foundation. Focuses on scaling operations and international expansion.

name: David Kim
bio: Former startup founder with 2 successful exits. Now helps early-stage companies navigate growth challenges. Expert in customer acquisition, team building, and fundraising strategies. Mentored 100+ founders.
